entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon then 40 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 1 April 2023
